comments.body: In Arrow 0.14, seems `as.data.frame(arrow_batch)` returns non-naive R DataFrame ("tbl_df tbl data.frame"). So, direct class comparison doesn't look working here.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +51,55 @@      # Check to see if inputData is a valid data.frame
      stopifnot(deserializer == "byte" || deserializer == "arrow")
      stopifnot(is.data.frame(inputData))
    }
